isis.stitle: VT 365 Diesel Engine - 2004 Model Year - IN-CHASSIS PROCEDURES - Installation

figure.caption: High-pressure oil pump assembly and STC fitting

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, a new STC fitting must be installed.

step1.para: Install a new STC fitting for the high-pressure oil pump.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not over tighten the STC fitting; if over tightened, the STC fitting will fail.

step1.para: Tighten new STC fitting to the special torque .

figure.caption: Mounting block on branch tube assembly

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, a new branch tube assembly must be installed.

step1.para: Grease each M6 x 40 torx bolt and insert into mounting blocks of new branch tube assembly.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not drop mounting bolts into crankcase.

step1.para: Position new branch tube assembly for mounting in crankcase.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, a new O-ring must be installed.

step1.para: Install new O-ring in the recess of the branch tube assembly.

figure.caption: Installation of bolts for branch tube adapter

step1.para: Install and loosely tighten two M6 x 30 mounting bolts to connect new branch tube adapter to branch tube assembly.
Look through back of crankcase, insert extension - with No. 27 torx bit attached - through exhaust pushrod hole for cylinder 6, and install and loosely tighten M6 x 40 torx bolt.
Look through back of crankcase, insert extension - with No. 27 torx bit attached - through exhaust pushrod hole for cylinder 7, and install and loosely tighten M6 x 40 torx bolt.
Tighten both M6 x 40 torx bolts to the special torque .
Torque both M6 x 30 mounting bolts to the special torquefor the branch tube adaptor .
Install exhaust pushrod for cylinder 6.
Install intake and exhaust pushrods for cylinders 7 and 8.
See Engine Service Manual - "Cylinder Head and Valve Train" to install the following:

item.para: Rocker arm assemblies (intake and exhaust) for cylinders 7 and 8.

step1.para: Install high-pressure oil pump cover. See Engine Service Manual - "High-pressure Oil Pump".

calloutgroup.callout1: V-clamp (Shielded tube exhaust assembly to turbocharger)

step1.para: Position pump gasket heat shield and install three bolts finger tight.
Tighten two M6 x 12 heat shield bolts to the special torque and one M10 x 16 heat shield bolt to the special torque .
Position shielded exhaust tube assembly on engine with right exhaust tube and EGR cooler gasket attached. Install four M8 exhaust bolts and nuts finger tight to secure assembly to exhaust manifolds.
Position V-clamp to connect shielded tube exhaust assembly to turbocharger and tighten V-clamp to the special torque .
Position V-clamp to connect right exhaust tube to EGR cooler and tighten V-clamp to to the special torque .
Tighten M8 bolts securing shielded exhaust tube assembly (right exhaust tube attached) to the special torque .
See Engine Service Manual - "Rear Cover, Flywheel, and Power Steering Gear Drive" for installation of the following:

item.para: Power steering and fuel pump assembly

step1.para: Reinstall wiring clips on rear cover, if necessary.
Install rear engine mounting brackets on the rear cover assembly and tighten eight M12 x 40 bolts the special torque .

figure.caption: Installation of through bolt into rear engine mount

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, make sure the lifting hoist and hooks are secure - before lowering the engine.

step1.para: Lower engine to set rear engine mounting brackets in chassis mounting brackets.
Install two M16 through bolts and nuts to secure rear engine mounts to chassis mounting brackets. Tighten nuts to the special torque .
Remove chain hoist.
Install starter motor assembly and tighten M10 x 40 starter bolts to the special torque .
Reconnect starter wiring.
Install clutch and pressure plate, if equipped with a manual transmission.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, use a suitable lifting device to support and raise transmission assembly.

step1.para: Install transmission assembly.

calloutgroup.callout1: V-clamp (Right exhaust tube to EGR cooler)
V-clamp (Shielded tube exhaust assembly to turbocharger)
Electronic Control Module (ECM) / Injector Drive Module (IDM)

step1.para: See Engine Service Manual- "Electronically Controlled Variable Geometry Turbocharger (VGT)" to install the following:
Install exhaust down pipe onto turbocharger exhaust flange and tighten exhaust clamp to the special torque .
See Engine Service Manual - "Engine Electrical" to install the following:

item.para: Electronic Control Module (ECM), Injector Driver Module (IDM), and mounting bracket.

step1.para: Plug in ECM and IDM electrical connectors.
Install EGR drive module with mounting bracket and plug in electrical connector.

figure.caption: Parts for Installation - Engine In-chassis (4100 truck)

step1.para: Install oil dipstick, washer bottle, and bracket, if removed.
Install alternator and air conditioning compressor mounting bracket and tighten M10 bolts to the special torque .
Install alternator and reconnect alternator wiring.
If removed, install air conditioning compressor.
If removed, install air compressor and mounting bracket. Tighten three M10 x 100 air compressor mounting bracket bolts to the special torque .
Reconnect air compressor lines and hoses.
Install serpentine drive belts.
Install CAC pipe and tighten clamps.
Install air intake duct, air filter housing, and mounting bracket.
Install right inner fender well, if removed.
Install inside engine cover in truck, if equipped. See Truck Service Manual.
Reconnect Electronic Control Module (ECM) ground and negative battery cable.
